title: Client stops working often during the starting process of ranked games.
body: this happens about every other time and is driving me insane... please send help (or advise).

replies.body: Does this happen during champion select or just after loading into a match? With a bit more info, I can provide you with accurate steps to take.

It happens during champion select, usually after something has happened (example: a ban, pick, etc.) However it has also happened when i have clicked back into league from Microsoft edge. The screen stops and soon after the message lol client is not responding appears. 
Thank you for getting back to me - trust me I appreciate it.

Gotcha, thanks for clarifying that. 

Issues during champion select are usually caused by the client dropping its connection to the server. Most of the time, this is a result of an unstable connection to the server, so I recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change with this.

I did not add this before because I thought that it was of little consequence but I was queued up with a friend in the game using the  same internet connection. Is the answer still the same and if so will the new client be more resistant to crashing if there is an internet issue?

Yes, there could still be network settings local to your PC causing the issue, even if you queued with a friend on the same connection.

I'm not sure about what changes the new client has in relation to connection, but we'll know more when it finally launches.

This just happened to me during ranked champion select. I was seeing the first few bans fine, i could hover my champ. On my duo's computer, I saw the next player submit their ban. But mine hovered with him at 0 for about 2 minutes. In that time, both of our connections 'timed out' despite nothing being wrong with our internet (I was running WinMTR at the time). Then the next I saw, it was my turn to pick, at 0 seconds, so we got "dodged" and I lost LP. Let me know what else I can provide in terms of repro.
